description:
In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of how to use some of the most common features of SharePoint 2013â€”in about an hour!

  • You will be equipped with the knowledge and confidence to be more productive at work and speak more intelligently to colleagues, peers and managers about SharePoint.
  • You will learn some of the most common language and terminology used by those who are familiar with SharePoint, such as Site Collections, Sites, Document Library, List and List Items.
  • You will learn the basics of security and you'll be able to secure a Site, Document Library or List
  • You will learn how to navigate around a SharePoint site and how to customize or theme it to make it look better.
title: SharePoint 2013 Fundamentals
